segments.text: The girl next to him is eagerly waiting, her arm raised toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her anticipation; she’s fully invested in this secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s sweet to see the cooperation between them, but it’s also concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of anger toward the situation; how can they be so careless?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman remains blissfully unaware, and that frustrates me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she could see the danger unfolding just behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocence is charming yet alarming; it’s a dangerous mix.
segments.speaker: PAR
